mapper.select: select id, user_name, password_md5, user_token, is_deleted, create_time from lou_springboot.tb_admin_user where id = #{id}
select id, user_name, password_md5, user_token, is_deleted, create_time from lou_springboot.tb_admin_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lou_springboot.tb_admin_user(user_name, password_md5, user_token, is_deleted, create_time) values (#{userName}, #{passwordMd5}, #{userToken}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime})

insert into lou_springboot.tb_admin_user(user_name, password_md5, user_token, is_deleted, create_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.passwordMd5}, #{entity.userToken}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into lou_springboot.tb_admin_user(user_name, password_md5, user_token, is_deleted, create_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.passwordMd5}, #{entity.userToken}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , password_md5 = values(password_md5) , user_token = values(user_token) , is_deleted = values(is_deleted) , create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update lou_springboot.tb_admin_user
user_name = #{userName},
password_md5 = #{passwordMd5},
user_token = #{userToken},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
